should i post the subject or not

forumNotes.author: Wonko the Sane
forumNotes.content:
> should i post the subject or not Sure, why not? I mean you do not need any particular "authorization", as long as the method does not involve programs of \*doubtful\* source, you are perfectly free to post it, or better you are kindly invited to do so ![:unsure:](http://reboot.pro/public/style_emoticons/default/unsure.png) . Without knowing what steps/procedures your method uses, I cannot say if it will be "news" or a duplicate (partially or fully) of a known existing method. In the worst case ![:mellow:](http://reboot.pro/public/style_emoticons/default/mellow.png) it will be a repetition and you know ![:unsure:](http://reboot.pro/public/style_emoticons/default/unsure.png): [http://en.wikipedia....atin_phrases:_R](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_Latin_phrases:_R "External link") Repetita juvant
![:mellow:](http://reboot.pro/public/style_emoticons/default/mellow.png) Wonko
